extendedInfo.description: BUZZ Player is a multimedia player supporting many audio and video codecs and file formats, and various streaming protocols. â BUZZ Player can play almost anything, including: +) Container formats: 3GP, AVI, ASF, FLV, MKV (Matroska), MOV (QuickTime), MP4, NUT, Ogg, OGM, RealMedia, Bink, WMV, XVID, DIVX. +) Video formats: Cinepak, DV, H.263, H.264/MPEG-4 AVC, HuffYUV, Indeo, MJPEG, MPEG-1, MPEG-2, MPEG-4 Part 2, RealVideo, Sorenson, Theora, WMV, Bink +) Audio formats: AAC, AC3, ALAC, AMR, DTS, FLAC, Intel Music Coder, Monkey's Audio, MP3, Musepack, RealAudio, Shorten, Speex, Vorbis, WMA, Bink. Supported video quality: Up to full HD quality (1920 x 1080 pixels) for mp4 media files (mp4, m4v, mpv) Up to HD quality (1280 x 720 pixels) for other media files (flv, mkv, wmv, avi, asf, divx, xvid, dat, vob, mpgâ¦) â BUZZ Player support 2 polular subtitle types including srt, sub and embedded subtitle, it also can display almost languages such as Japanese, Chinese, Arabic, Hebrew, English, French, Italian, German, Thai, Vietnameseâ¦ BUZZ Player also allow user to change various settings of subtitle: font color, font size, font type, position, timing offset. It displays subtitle on more than one line when needed â BUZZ Player supports various protocols: RTP, RTSP, HTTP, FTP, MMS, Netstream (mpst://), SMB, ffmpeg://, that allows user not only play media files from local but also play media files from remote servers and devices. User can use BUZZ Player to connect to their IP cameras and servers to play media from them. â BUZZ Player also has Built-in Network Browser allows user to play and copy files from Widows/Mac/Linux PC, remote SAMBA servers, FTP servers, Media Server (uPnP) and Air Video Server (SMB & FTP & uPnP & Air Video Server Support). It can remember user name / password for Local Network Connection so that you don't need to retype them next time open local network â BUZZ Player can play media files from external application such as browser, mail, readers... â Connect Network through cellular network (3G, GPRS...) â Audio/Video/Subtitle Stream Selector feature: allow you to select audio/video/subtitle streams of one audio/video file that have multi embedded audio/video/subtitle streams â More playback functions: fast forward; fast backward; remember playing position of media file at stop time and automatically resume at the next time, Auto-Balance audio channels to justify left-right audio channels and master volume while playing an audio/video file, change aspect ratio of playing video â Manage local files/folders easily : rename, move, copy files/folders... â Sort Files/Folders: sort files, folders on device or local network by name, date, file type, file size... We are working hard everyday to add new features to BUZZ Player, so BUZZ Player is always up to date, it contains the most advanced technology and brings the most comfortable to end users.Let's use BUZZ Player from today and feel what excellent it could do!

reviews.title: Good stuff for karaoke note 10.1
reviews.comment: Finally i found the really good software to balance the left right volume panning.. This app made it!!!  Now.. I can karaoke on my left or right ONLY to hear!! My speaker note 10.1 work...  Thanks
reviews.author: Icun Lin

reviews.title: Excellent media player
reviews.comment: Works perfectly on Samsung P7100 (aka 10.1v). Feature rich. File browser a bonus. Flawless video playing. Could do with some higher res icons for main screen. Highly recommended for honeycomb tablet owners.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very bad
reviews.comment: Bad apps. Do not comply with what stated. No support team at all. No feedback from all email sent! waste of money..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: File support sub-par
reviews.comment: Would not recognize unpn .wmv files or .flv files. Free software like bubble unpn + moboplayer can do almost everything this can. I guess i\'ll have to convert all my video files....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No hi res ?
reviews.comment: Does not work well on xoom. Have written to dev... no answer. No good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: buggy
reviews.comment: smb doesnt show the files whereas the ipad version works fine. vobs keep displaying the subtitles even if disabled in the settings. very disappointing app.
reviews.author: John Doe

reviews.title: Fills a missing gap in smb support for android.
reviews.comment: I needed an smb application that could stream flac and avi from my nas. This app has bugs but considering the options available... Well spent 5 bucks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Epic fail
reviews.comment: I thought this app would be as good if not better than my pad buzz player but i was wrong. It is very buggy, hangs often and ia horrible at playing HD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Audio out of sync
reviews.comment: Plays many file types, but audio is out of sync n also cannot connect to my ftp from external up address, just local ip :-( please fix these two things n it will be the best app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hangs to much
reviews.comment: Using ICS with a Seagate GoFlex Hard drive, this app hangs every time I exit out of a video. It does do the trick of playing an video file, which my Seagate can\'t handle right now App wise, but work needs to be done to eliminate the hanging. Requires a restart every time I back out of a video, this is a pain and time consuming. Right now probably a 1.99 app, not a 5.00 app. Once these are fixed consider buying. Until than find a more reliable alternative.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Asus Transformer
reviews.comment: DOSE NOT PLAY WMV files - if it will be fixed will be a good app for 5 baks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for Humax HDR-foxt2 Wi-Fi
reviews.comment: Have spent a couple of weeks messing about with my new Human Hdr box, very limited info out there but have found the Buzz Player is the only such application that let\'s me transfer programmes (.ts files) directly over Wi-Fi to my Google Nexus S in a form that can then be played back (have found MxPlayer to be the best) without any messing about with laptop/ converting etc.  Brilliant.  Just a tip, I did find Buzzplayer a bit buggy at first, but after a phone factory reset all seems fine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What happen?
reviews.comment: Dev team, did you even use the app? Its worthless. IOS platform is way better. I wouldn\'t give it 2 stars even if it was free, let alone $5. A total waste. Dont bother trying. I love this app on my iPad and iPhone, worth every penny. But on Android, total waste. What happen?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent player, does the job.
reviews.comment: This video player worked where others have failed. I fully intended to get a refund doubting it\'s ability, but it worked! GUI is clunky but usable, wish it was better, reason for four stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great player; little buggy w certain file formats
reviews.comment: 1) cannot access dir /mnt/ (home directory is set as /mnt/sdcard w no way of changing it) so I cannot get to my external HDD, and 2) There seems to be V+A syncing problems with MKV files, especially after skipping ahead 3) It would be nice to have the aspect button near the volume bar remember its setting, but isnt as major of an issue as 1 and 2. Please fix these issues and make this app better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Will not sync
reviews.comment: Liked the idea of this as I have lots of films on a shared drive. Looked good to start with but then realised that the sound was not synchronising with the video. Could not work out why this was tried files on the local system, vie my shared drive and also across my Tversity server. All had the same problem. Sent an email to BUGUN Software asking for advise two months ago still no reply. Until I got the reminder to update to new version I had just thought, well it was only a few quid what else can I expect. But then I thought well they are happy to send out email for new versions why can\'t they reply to questions. Don\'t bother it doesn\342\200\231t work, save your money try some other method. Upnplay works well & it\'s free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great on iOS - Not usable on Android
reviews.comment: Save your money, this software does not play back HD (720p+)  properly and  just quits when opening most files. Works great on iOS - pretty much unusable on Android. I tried all the players and only MoboPlayer works well for all files.
reviews.author: Roberto Colarusso

reviews.title: Need improvement s
reviews.comment: Great tool to watch video in local network but have problems when restoring it, needs to be restarted each time to functional properly, ui and navigation needs update for android. I have it also on ipad at it work much better there
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Plays all my movies!
reviews.comment: Works well plays all my movies on my nas but I wish that the devs would release a HD or tablet version because it looks horrible on my sony tablet s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FTP Streaming doesn\'t work - no support
reviews.comment: Purchased 4 weeks ago because I was looking for an app to stream music from my FTP site while traveling. I\'ve got another app to send/receive files from my phone and it works great, but I cannot even connect with this app. I tried for a week to troubleshoot with no success, so I emailed the developer. That was 3 weeks ago and no response as of today (if you are the developer and reading this, please respond if you want this rating improved). Be warned before purchasing!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
